ygData.subject: Re: Treeants
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I may as well tell you now luckily I ve gotten up to level 29 and my hunting ground is only good for one more level maybe two. Personally I m kind of
ygData.messageBody: Well I may as well tell you now luckily I've gotten up to level 29 and my hunting ground is only good for one more level maybe two. Personally I'm kind of confused why somebody would tell it all over a mailing list. Anyway the Treeants in South Karana is my hunting ground well was. The only problem is the good races can't there because they become kos by all Qeynos guards, the treefolk, some other treefolk, and druids. However they do gain good faction with the evil druids.
